custom_css: .template-search__header h1 {color: #595757; text-align: center; font-family: Noto Sans JP; font-size: 2.4rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; line-height: calc(34 / 24);}
.template-search__header p {color: #595757; text-align: center; font-family: Noto Sans JP; font-size: 1.6rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; line-height: calc(28 / 16);}
